The indirect standardization method calculates the standardized mortality rate as follows:
A: SIR multiplied by the total standard population
B: SMR x standard population mortality rate
C: SIR x standard population mortality rate

Question: SMR is:
A: Expected number of deaths/actual number of deaths
D: Actual number of deaths/expected number of deaths

Question: Observe which diseases are the main causes of death for local residents, and use
C: Mortality rate of a certain disease
